message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe would be incredibly valuable to your business. I've assessed its worth to you at $1,200,000, and I'm willing to offer it to you for a price that reflects its significant value while leaving room for a mutually beneficial deal.  I'm proposing a price of $1,000,000.  This represents a substantial saving for you and ensures a profitable outcome for both of us.  I understand this is a significant investment, so please feel free to ask any questions you may have.  I'm confident this product will be a game-changer for you.
